Data Transfer Object that provides available filter options for log queries in the audit system.

## Key Components

- **LogFilterResponse** - Main DTO class containing all available filter categories
- **eventTypes** - List of available event type strings for filtering
- **toolTypes** - List of available tool type strings for filtering  
- **severities** - List of available severity level strings for filtering
- **organizations** - List of `OrganizationFilterResponse` objects for organization-based filtering

## Usage Example

```java
// Building a filter response with available options
LogFilterResponse filterOptions = LogFilterResponse.builder()
    .eventTypes(List.of("LOGIN", "LOGOUT", "DATA_ACCESS", "CONFIGURATION_CHANGE"))
    .toolTypes(List.of("API", "WEB_UI", "MOBILE_APP", "BATCH_PROCESS"))
    .severities(List.of("INFO", "WARN", "ERROR", "CRITICAL"))
    .organizations(List.of(
        OrganizationFilterResponse.builder()
            .id("org-123")
            .name("Acme Corp")
            .build()
    ))
    .build();

// Accessing filter options
List<String> availableEvents = filterOptions.getEventTypes();
List<OrganizationFilterResponse> availableOrgs = filterOptions.getOrganizations();
```

The class uses Lombok annotations for automatic generation of getters, setters, constructors, and builder pattern. Swagger annotations provide API documentation describing each field's purpose in the OpenAPI specification.
